item.description:
Entrepreneurs, you must connect.  As part of our dedication to building the Northeast entrepreneurial community, we feature events that will help you find the resources and guidance you need to succeed.

 

Are you looking for an opportunity to work with other creative and talented people to advance an idea you have? Want to explore an idea for a night? Do you like pizza? Are you typically at loose ends on Thursday nights? If you answered yes to even one of these questions, join us for LaunchHaven.

 

Launch Haven will be an “un-conference” style meetup that offers you a unique opportunity to:

 

  • Pitch an idea you want to work on,
  • Find others who want to work on an idea with you for a night, and
  • Hang out, network and learn.

 

LaunchHaven registration is $10/ person (to offset food costs). Developers, designers, engineers, makers, non-profit/social enterprise innovators, artists, inventors, and people with new ideas are all welcome to attend.

IMPORTANT: You must register on the LaunchHaven Eventbrite page in order to attend. Cash will not be accepted, and walk-in's are not welcome (sorry.)  
launchhaven.eventbrite.com
item.name: Let's Check Out LaunchHaven!
